00027 #ifndef LIBFREENECT_H
00028 #define LIBFREENECT_H
00029 
00030 #include <stdint.h>
00031 
00032 #ifdef __cplusplus
00033 extern "C" {
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 typedef uint16_t freenect_depth;
00037 typedef uint8_t freenect_pixel;
00038 
00039 #define FREENECT_FRAME_W 640
00040 #define FREENECT_FRAME_H 480
00041 #define FREENECT_FRAME_PIX (FREENECT_FRAME_H*FREENECT_FRAME_W)
00042 #define FREENECT_RGB_SIZE (FREENECT_FRAME_PIX*3)
00043 #define FREENECT_BAYER_SIZE (FREENECT_FRAME_PIX)
00044 #define FREENECT_DEPTH_SIZE (FREENECT_FRAME_PIX*sizeof(freenect_depth))
00045 #define FREENECT_COUNTS_PER_G 819
00046 
00047 typedef enum {
00048         FREENECT_FORMAT_RGB = 0,
00049         FREENECT_FORMAT_BAYER = 1,
00050 } freenect_rgb_format;
00051 
00052 typedef enum {
00053     LED_OFF    = 0,
00054     LED_GREEN  = 1,
00055     LED_RED    = 2,
00056     LED_YELLOW = 3,
00057     LED_BLINK_YELLOW = 4,
00058     LED_BLINK_GREEN = 5,
00059     LED_BLINK_RED_YELLOW = 6
00060 } freenect_led_options;
00061 
00062 typedef enum {    
00063         FREENECT_FORMAT_11_BIT = 0,
00064         FREENECT_FORMAT_10_BIT = 1
00065 } freenect_depth_format;
00066 
00067 struct _freenect_context;
00068 typedef struct _freenect_context freenect_context;
00069 
00070 struct _freenect_device;
00071 typedef struct _freenect_device freenect_device;
00072 
00073 // usb backend specific section
00074 #include <libusb.h>
00075 typedef libusb_context freenect_usb_context;

00087 void freenect_set_user(freenect_device *dev, void *user);

00090 typedef void (*freenect_depth_cb)(freenect_device *dev, freenect_depth *depth, uint32_t timestamp);
00091 typedef void (*freenect_depth_raw_cb)(freenect_device *dev, uint8_t *depth_raw, uint32_t timestamp);
00092 typedef void (*freenect_rgb_cb)(freenect_device *dev, freenect_pixel *rgb, uint32_t timestamp);
00093 
00094 void freenect_set_depth_callback(freenect_device *dev, freenect_depth_cb cb);
00095 void freenect_set_depth_raw_callback(freenect_device *dev, freenect_depth_raw_cb cb);
00096 void freenect_set_rgb_callback(freenect_device *dev, freenect_rgb_cb cb);

00098 int freenect_set_depth_format(freenect_device *dev, freenect_depth_format fmt);
